lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first is our first sponsor for the night which is NordVPN.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, if you don't-- Sam? Sam was supposed--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember, they tried to defeat the Ultra Codex and were banished inside the internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, but then how are we supposed to, like, do this NordVPN sponsorship, then, if we don't have either of them, and also, what are Sam and Laura doing now if they're not here? (electronic music)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where in the cyber code are we now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The brony web, DARPAnet, heck, we might even be in Bing, where no one goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! (digital lasers firing) Laser sword! (grunts) (horse neighs) (glass shatters) (cat cries)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? We make a pretty elite team.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to get to safety.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, I think somehow we've managed to port into Dani Carr's Pinterest account.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be safe here for a while, but to get out of the dark net we need someone to unjack us from the Ultra Codex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where can we find someone like that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I swore I was through with my hacker past, but I guess it's time to boot up and suit up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right now, NordVPN has a special offer: a three year plan with 70% off, plus an additional month free if you sign up at https://NordVPN.com/criticalrole, https://NordVPN.com/criticalrole, or use a coupon code, Critical Role, at checkout! Now, I'm going to use it for one last slice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, thanks, guys and thank you, NordVPN.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, you had something you wanted to talk about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (cheering) Featuring a story, which we have all definitely heard, from Travis Willingham.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, man, what a crazy story.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That kind of threw me for a loop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The first one we got to the end perfectly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The stage blood substitutions that you guys had were really ingenious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I thought the inclusion of a musical number was really inspired.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true. Somebody had to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, you had something to talk about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did have something to talk about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In case you guys missed it a few weeks ago, we introduced this Funko Pop!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's so pretty on a broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take it out of the box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to unbox myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to lose half its value.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be available at Best

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't believe you had to read that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got a witch hat, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, I'm so excited about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she holding a little coin in her hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You came across the sound of something creepy, like a sobbing sound in the distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon which, it seemed a bit perturbed by your presence and began to make itself very aggressively known.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think it was a bad idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks so good! Oh, there are tar pools.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, is that what that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, those are the various pools of that tar-like liquid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What Caduceus kept getting his foot stuck in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just like the La Brea Tar Pits. Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Steve can tell us all about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right, that's right, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, the rest of you are who are holding back for the time being, where abouts are you standing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, which way did we come from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which direction were we coming, towards you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were heading this direction around this way and then began moving this way to investigate where the sound was coming from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, man, he's already base to base with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will-- Does anybody have any--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I be up on the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, sorry, yeah, you go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, down by that pool bank, if I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To your right. Yeah, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be on this rock on my corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I realize putting myself near a pool probably sucks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got one save, right? You can do one little hop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I go, which one is this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I go near this tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would not have had enough time to encircle the entire space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go behind this big thick tree right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, but we were togetherish, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So put me closer to Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, I'll put you over in this space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where abouts? That's what the laser pointers are for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I would've been behind that stone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so, I feel like I was kind of near Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So possibly over on this space?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Listen, the glasses don't work with the outfit, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You definitely teach drama at the local middle school.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What medium do you sculpt in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll get to that in a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Nott, Beau, Fjord, Yasha, and then Jester?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It hasn't made an aggressive move yet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's aggressive in the sense that it just (swishes) appeared right in front of Beauregard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going to play it safe, and (startles) I'm going to cast Spider Climb on myself--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- and scurry up that tree next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Is that concentration?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably. Why, was I doing something else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It does not say-- oh, it is concentration, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scurry up that tree and if I can, bonus action, sort of hide in those-- the foliage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking at Beau to see if she looks scared or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're holding your action just in case something--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These faint, little, bobbing, blue flames.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that's not a good sign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something like that, you could say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More like kill-o'-wisps, am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They then immediately begin to drift towards the nearest source of life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Source of light or life? Because I'm kind of dark inherently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against you, Fjord, it's going to go ahead and attempt to (swooshes) dart in your direction, like, towards your shoulder area, like it's about to just butt in towards your torso.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, you take 13 points of lightning damage as it shocks you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It comes into contact with you and as it does, this jolt arcs through your body as a bit of your life force seems to have been (puffs) pulled out from the impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me give it to you. (shuddering yell)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 19 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take eight points of lightning damage as it also swoops in towards your body, and you try and move out of the way, and you technically dodge its impact, but it's about a foot away and, still, these arcs of lightning (sizzles) arc off of it and blast to your body, and you feel your muscles tense from the pain as you pull away and the sparks dissipate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those were just a melee attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's rolling to hit you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It absorbs it, no actual damage done to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't use one of the Shield-- boy, I'm out of it-- Shield of Retribution on this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to. If you have the ability to do so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're coordinating so well right now, Taliesin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're on deck, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The hair and his shirt and his backdrop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "When a creature misses you with a melee attack--" It's not a melee attack, is it? Or is it? Was that a melee attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is force damage, you said, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure feels like a good candidate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- but with the modifier, it's a 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my spell save, right? Spell save is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there not one put on the shield?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, yeah, we'll say it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it gets pushed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look how pretty those trees are, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It jams into the tree behind and vanishes inside of it before slowly emerging from the outer side, right below where Nott is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, now, Beau, it is your turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of your turn,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because it's got a big ol' mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are now staring directly into its gaping face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's kind of depressing to look at.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But can't you do monk stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as Beauregard puts her fists up, looks into its face, and her eyes go white, and she drops to the ground, unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My dope monk shit can't fix that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she rolling death saves or she's just out and stable? We don't know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to roll a death saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the last time I try to relate to somebody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will run over to Beau, use all 30 feet to get on over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that thing get to attack him or anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, so I get a attack of opportunity from the flame?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 12 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshes) Manage to just avoid the arc's energy, (sizzles) goes across the ground, and you dodge right out of the way as you rush around and head towards Beauregard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see Beau fall to the ground, and I go into a baseball slide, and I slide across the ground, and I place a hand on her, and I'll do Lay on Hands--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my action, as my bonus action, I'll look up and cast Hexblade's Curse right in its face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right on its face, you got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The element of the Wild Mother drawing into its necrotic presence to dig deeper into its body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it just darkness in its mouth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's just a void of darkness.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so, I'm going to run over to Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, up to just to back of her, or--?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I kind of-- Let me go to where I could maybe also attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have the enough movement to do that with Beauregard over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, wow, that's a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 11 points of lightning damage as you feel it hit you from behind, but you just grit your teeth and keep running.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to lean down to Beau and use Healing Hands on her, which will heal you for 12 hit points.

lines.text: Your Healing Hands is an action?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to just hover over Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you still have a bonus action if you want to do anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you can rage as a bonus, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you get up, now both Fjord and Yasha flanking Beauregard staring at this creature, you feel the adrenaline surge through your system, and your eyes narrow, your teeth grit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Being able to get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now the creature's turn, if you're done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool, all three of us, hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its head is just suddenly facing forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- a constitution saving throw for me, Fjord.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the heck is this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your vision goes into this dark tunnel and then returns, your whole body is pulsing with intense pain rooted deep in your system that you haven't felt before, and you feel like a part of you is just gone.

lines.text: Bet it changed your max hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to get the fuck out.

lines.text: I just thought of something, and it's so not appropriate and I want to do it.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get over here, maybe, but you'll be in melee with the will-o'-wisp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to get over the trunk to get over there, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use Vex's broom to fly over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dumb is the best, do dumb.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so stupid! I'm going to try to use the Wand of Smiles on it.

lines.text: Oh god, oh no, that's so terrible! It's a low save! It's a real low save!

lines.text: Well, the Destroy Undead itself has a specific--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's much higher DC that that,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I don't know if the will-o'-wisp thingies are undead either, but anything within 30 feet of me.

lines.text: Within 30 feet of you? So the one that's right in front of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they will both make saves--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Had a little too many vegetables.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those wisps, you watch as the two flames that are flickering there-- (poof) and the lights are snuffed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So this thing on its turn--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Full fucking speed away from us.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the big bad take any damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He got turned but he didn't get destroyed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that finish your turn, Jester? That was your movement, your action, you have a bonus still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my bonus action, can I do a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because Channel Divinity is not a spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, great, then I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my bonus action, I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon at 4th-level, so it's got my serrated lollipop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slick, and we'll put it right on the other, next to Fjord?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put it-- yeah, next to the guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♪ I'm going to make your lollipop ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I want to look and see if I hit him, does it break the turn undead? It's not like that, it's not like a charm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think there's nothing, it's just run no matter what.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm going to try to hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double check on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♪ I'mma take you to the candy shop. ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "If the creature fails its saving throw against turn undead--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns for one minute, or until it takes any damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'll just protect my friends with my spiritual weapon, but I won't hit it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up. Caduceus, you're on deck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there any of the glowing blue balls left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So he would step out diagonally to his right to see what is going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha and Fjord both there facing off with this creature, Jester's spiritual weapon apparates in the air, but isn't taking any notion yet, and that's all you see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so seeing that and calculating very quickly, I will start muttering and take a bite of licorice root and cast Haste on Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think advantage on dex saves? Is that how it works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And yeah, the extra action for a single attack or anything else you want to try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "The action can be used only to take the attack, "dash, disengage, hide--" Yeah, 10 feet of movement, and I'll go back behind the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the beginning of your turn,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a constitution saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see this dark black hole--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can it do that even when under Turn Undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not-- It's not an action it takes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I do take half damage or something like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to be fine, we're going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you doing with your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to yell at everybody: Don't look at its eyes, don't look at its eyes! Don't look in there, oh man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not the eyes, it's the mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to cast Bless at 3rd-level--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- for myself, Beau, Fjord, Jester, and Yasha. Just everyone who's in the thick of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get an extra d4 on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so who was it? Yasha, Beau, and who else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should run, and I'm going to start backing off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to be about-- Actually, yeah, I'm just going to move five feet to the left, 10 feet to the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get right there, and then before that, you start getting in to puddle territory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Can I stay on the rocks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending your turn, Viridian, the druid who's been traveling with you, comes rushing up from the side where you guys were to see this scenario.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to go ahead and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a thing they know about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as one bolt of energy goes (sizzles) out of this cloud and slams into the creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like to think of that in character in the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could always try it again, and, unfortunately, she was not present for that shout.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you just burp or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, there's something wrong with my flask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think I cleaned it real well last week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I've been watching you sip it this whole time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not drink from it anymore tonight, Sam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should've gotten smooth instead of the chunky, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One out of hundreds of episodes.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never seen you this panicked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, it's never tasted this bad before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even the live show with the old Scanlan-- never mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, your pain isn't funny, but I'm laughing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, okay. (Veth-like yells) Um... I'm going to-- Am I on a branch-- I mean, I spider climbed up.

lines.text: You're hiding amongst the various branches and thick foliage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I grab onto a branch?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In case I lose my spiders.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will take out a bit of-- if I can one-handed, or I guess with a finger, I'll take out a bit of fur and rub it in my hand and touch the bolt in my awesome crossbow, and I will aim it and cast

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will fire my cross

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for and roll an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it, what is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are hidden, so you have advantage on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh... ♪ doot doodoo doot doodoo doot. ♪

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's another 13 points of damage, 44 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a healthy chunk of damage on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, are you going to stay put or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last will-o'-wisp is going to take its turn now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's going to go ahead and shift towards Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to attempt to strike you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you see it coming out of the way, and you duck as it just glides overhead and is now floating just slightly above you right now, the flames (fluttering) hovering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get these hula hoops off of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We better get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing on your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm going to stand up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to-- is the bolt Nott fired still in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. Are you looking towards the creature?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Genius level shit, Matthew Mercer, genius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm so glad I did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sitting on that since Campaign 1 began.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: if we'd have come over this way, we could've found her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly, but you had no reason to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We would've had to have come this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the other side of the planet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It doesn't matter because Keyleth is still totally, essentially the same age.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Alive, yeah! Keyleth is definitely still kicking!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth could have her mom back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought my mom was dead! They said my mom was dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all they ever found was her leg! Why didn't we realize that earlier?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got the fucking vine for a leg!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We didn't know that she had lost a leg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because they said that she went into the Water Plane--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All they found was her leg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So! So is this thing a fucked up kraken? Is that all this thing is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, we don't need to know the specifics yet, it just means that your mom fell into the Bermuda Triangle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude, who the fuck are these other people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is so funny and amazing to me, I mean, we are the most suspicious people, and it didn't occur to any of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, because it was in another campaign!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When did you figure it out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right like 15, 20 minutes ago, I just glanced down to see how many people are watching our show at the end of the night, and in chat, flying by--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- flying by, somebody goes, "I think that's Keyleth's mom."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I was like, what? Oh fuck! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam texted me and then I was like, "We got to share this with M," He went, "No!" And I went, "Why, it's Beau!" And I sent it to you like 10 minutes ago, but you never saw it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm not looking at my phone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so glad you didn't see it out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't whisper to each other because we're not next to each other!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been holding onto that Greater Restoration the whole goddamn day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited for the next one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I haven't closed it yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you see guys in the next episode.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: (chanting) Four more hours! Four more hours!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's Korrin going to think?! Ah! Is Korrin still alive?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but Marisha knows Korrin as Keyleth as my past life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know Tal'Dorei at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It all's blurry. Who's on the Tal'Dorei council?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of you have been there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night. (laughs) (yelling)
